issue.title: [C++] Determine whether we need to implement BYTE_ARRAY-backed Decimal reads
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These are valid in the parquet spec, but it seems like no system in use today implements a writer for this type.

We should determine whether this is YAGNI, or if it's actually in use anywhere.
